title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: Column icons are not displaying as expected when connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view.
OB: Column icons are not visible in the Data Explorer view after connecting to a Derby database. Instead, the columns appear without any associated icons.
EB: Column icons should be displayed in the Data Explorer view when connecting to a Derby database. These icons provide visual cues or indicators for different column properties, contributing to a more user-friendly interface.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Generate a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, establish a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query.
